policy_text: Employees are entitled to 10 sick leave days per year. Medical certificate required for absences exceeding 2 consecutive days.
Employees receive 20 annual leave days per year. Must be requested at least 2 weeks in advance.
Emergency leave granted for family emergencies or unforeseen circumstances. Maximum 5 days per year.
Female employees entitled to 6 months (180 days) paid maternity leave. Medical certificate required.
Male employees entitled to 2 weeks (14 days) paid paternity leave upon birth of child.
Employees granted 5 days bereavement leave for immediate family members.
Employees pursuing approved courses may request study leave. Maximum 10 days per year.
Unpaid leave may be granted at manager's discretion after all paid leave is exhausted.
Overtime work may be compensated with time off. Must be approved by manager.
Company observes all national public holidays. No leave deduction for public holidays.
